value.title: Passion
value.description: Every cup is crafted with love and dedication, ensuring the perfect coffee experience for our customers.

value.title: Sustainability
value.description: We source our beans ethically and use eco-friendly practices to protect our environment.

value.title: Community
value.description: Building connections and creating a welcoming space where everyone feels at home.

value.title: Quality
value.description: We never compromise on quality, from our premium beans to our exceptional service.

team.name: Hiroshi Tanaka
team.bio: With over 15 years of experience in the coffee industry, Hiroshi founded Cozy Cafe to share his passion for exceptional coffee.

team.name: Yuki Sato
team.bio: Yuki brings creativity and precision to every cup, specializing in latte art and specialty brewing methods.

team.name: Kenji Yamamoto
team.bio: Kenji creates our delicious pastries and desserts, using traditional techniques with modern flavors.

testimonials.text: Cozy Cafe has become my second home. The atmosphere is perfect for both work and relaxation, and the coffee is absolutely incredible!
testimonials.author: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.title: Regular Customer

testimonials.text: The attention to detail in every cup is remarkable. You can taste the passion and quality in every sip. Highly recommended!
testimonials.author: Michael Chen
testimonials.title: Coffee Enthusiast

testimonials.text: Not only is the coffee exceptional, but the staff always makes me feel welcome. It's the perfect neighborhood cafe.
testimonials.author: Emma Wilson
testimonials.title: Local Resident
